name: 99 Clones
description:
The Sisters of the Blue Nebula have been kidnapped and it's up to you and your ship of 99 clones to rescue them.

A fast paced mix of twitch platforming and puzzle play. You control both your Space Rover and your clones. Together you must deploy bombs and build bridges all the while avoiding alien life to bring your Space Rover to the rescue.

Support for Windows, Mac, Linux, and Android TV. The game has been tested on Mac and Windows. If you have an issue with the Linux build please let us know.

Quick tip based on some feedback to date: To build a bridge longer, hold down the X button (or V/L on the keyboard) - you can build bridges up to 8 squares long in the direction your clone is facing.

Check out the trailer on youtube: Watch Video

Keyboard and Controller support. Xbox 360, XBox One, and Steam Controller supported.

If playing on Android it requires a full controller- Android TV is the recommended Android platform.

99 Clones was developed by Five Media Software Group during the #libGDXjam. This game jam was between the 19th December 2015 and the 18th January 2016.

You can find the sources of the game on GitHub

Visit: www.fivemedia.ca

Follow: @fivemediasg

Like: facebook/fivemediasg

Sound Effects and Music by: Village Sound
